data.name: Muruse, the Opulent
data.notes: "Muruse, the Opulent" is a golden Blatta clinging to a wall in the secret passage in vitriol cesspool, a cave near FN Site 209 in the west side of Noctilum. The passage within vitriol cesspool is to the left in a crack near the fishy Purgovents. Muruse is high up on a wall to the right about halfway through this long tunnel, not at the end of it.
